item.title: CVE-2024-22770|2024-10-22T03:55:41.379Z -- hitron%20systems -- dvr%20hvr-16781
item.description: Improper Input Validation in Hitron Systems DVR HVR-16781 1.03~4.02 allows an attacker to cause network attack in case of using defalut admin ID/PW.
